name: A¹ Yukon Solitaire Card Game
description:
Yukon solitaire is one of the popular and favorite solitaire card games. It's beautiful app designed for everyone!

FREE NOW!

The cards must be placed into four stacks in ascending order, from Ace to King.
Multiple cards can be moved from one column to another to form a descending sequence of alternating colors.
A group of cards headed by a King can be moved to an empty column.

Yukon is a version of solitaire similar to standard Klondike solitaire, but with the following additions:
1. Groups of cards can be moved; the cards below the one to be moved do not need to be in any order, except that the starting and target cards must be built in sequence and in alternate color. For example, a group starting with a Red 3 can be moved on top a Black 4, and the cards below the Red 3 can differ.
2. There is no stock in Yukon. All cards are dealt at the beginning; however, some are face down.

Main Features
- Support iPhone, iTouch, iPad
- 12 kinds of Card Backgrounds
- 14 Kinds of App Backgrounds
- Easy to Use Interface
- HD retina display quality cards and backgrounds
- Smooth animations
- Soothing background music and sound fx
- How to play instructions
